text: avei del mean now leumekh cheachraen chean ning phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . haey brasenbae puok anak leat tradeang avei del mean nowknong khluon robsa puok anak ryy puok anak leakbang vea ku a l laoh nung chomnoumchomreah puok anak nouv tongveu noh . haey a l laoh nung aphytosa champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea ning dak tondakamm champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea . haey a l laoh mean anoupheap leu avei teangoasa
